Texas Lt. Gov defends importance of 'in-classroom' learning as kids go back to school Texas Lt. Gov. Dan Patrick outlined on Saturday his state's plans for returning kids to school amid the coronavirus pandemic and defended the idea that students needed to experience learning in the classroom rather than online.
